data.eml:eml: A new species of the schizomid genus Stenochrus (Schizomida: Hubbardiidae) from Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monjaraz-Ruedas, Rodrigo (2012): A new species of the schizomid genus Stenochrus (Schizomida: Hubbardiidae) from Mexico. Zootaxa 3334: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281293
